title: The Values String
description: The Values String is a book on Transitional Life, Compelling Fulfillment, and Profound Peace.Plot a course through The Values String, to discover the interconnection among transformation, fulfillment, and peace.You need not release a bestselling record or be successful at auditions, to prove you’ve got talent. Apply your melodious voice to the author’s composed songs and you will see as you explore this book, you are certain to experience your ability to sing to, through, and out of any circumstance.Revealed in this work, is an unconventional approach to self-mastery and betterment. One value is a gemstone. Envisage owning several values and stringing them…
author: Ukpeme Akpan Okon
